docs.snippet: The menacing language Donald Trump uses about Hillary Clinton is reminiscent of extremists’ talk that fed Yitzhak Rabin’s assassin in Israel in 1995....
docs.lead_paragraph: The menacing language Donald Trump uses about Hillary Clinton is reminiscent of extremists’ talk that fed Yitzhak Rabin’s assassin in Israel in 1995.
docs.abstract: Thomas L Friedman Op-Ed column likens Donald Trump's hint that Second Amendment supporters could use violence to stop Hillary Clinton to irresponsible rhetoric that led to assassination of Israeli Prime Min Yitzhak Rabin; holds Trump knows exactly what he is doing, and warns of extreme danger he presents; expresses hope Trump will be soundly defeated as message of just how unacceptable his behavior and language has become.

headline.main: Trump’s Wink Wink to ‘Second Amendment People’
